title: Uber Clone
description: Uber Clone is a full-stack ride-hailing application inspired by Uber, allowing users to book rides, track drivers in real-time, and manage payments. It includes role-based features for riders and drivers, real-time location tracking, ride history, and secure authentication.

title: Reeleat â€“ Reels-based Food Discovery App
description: Reeleat is a modern, reels-style food discovery platform inspired by Zomato, where users explore restaurants and dishes through swipeable vertical food reels. The app delivers a fast, immersive, and visual browsing experience with smooth animations, restaurant profiles, creator-style food videos, and smart recommendations. Includes dual authentication for Users and Food Partners, real-time content updates, and restaurant dashboards for uploading food reels.
features: Swipe, like, comment, and save interactions
Food Partner dashboard to upload videos/images
Interactive restaurant pages with menus & ratings
Real-time feed updates with optimized APIs
Highly responsive UI with smooth animations
